Conjuration 6

Contact Beregina

EA Rus,  MA Vanarus,  LA Bogarus

Ritual

spell id [id]: 247
effect number [effect_number]: 21
damage [damage]: 1955

Summon Commander:#1955 Beregina
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster approaches a shore or riverbank and tries to contact a Beregina. The Beregina is a spirit of the shore, where water meets land. Bereginy manifest themselves as incredibly beautiful women. Few mortals would dream of harming a Beregina. They are powerful mages of Water, but are also skilled in magic of the land. The Bereginy are able to bring a few companions with them under the waves.
